channel.name: Problem with UI State not being updated after smart contract TX is triggered

messages.content:
I think I have an issue with my `IsNumberEven` smart contract or the way I build the TX.
https://github.com/Dacomis/mina-zk-app-guessing-game-with-ui/blob/main/contracts/src/IsNumberEven.ts

Because when I make a TX from the UI, the TX seems to be build correctly (I made a comparison with the `04-zkapp-browser-ui` tutorial.)
This is my `onSendTransaction` from `index.page.tsx`:
https://github.com/Dacomis/mina-zk-app-guessing-game-with-ui/blob/2782e80c3ca9990e182b42a82e9dfcaa5d405d03/ui/src/pages/index.page.tsx#L138C9-L138C26

When I try to call the function `handleGuess` the state from the SC in `index.page.tsx` is not properly updated (see the attached image below).
https://github.com/Dacomis/mina-zk-app-guessing-game-with-ui/blob/2782e80c3ca9990e182b42a82e9dfcaa5d405d03/ui/src/pages/index.page.tsx#L182

But I don't know how exactly I should check if my smart contract is okay or if I build the transaction from `onSendTransaction` in a wrong way because the signature of the tx is `NULL` in `authorization` object?
```
"signature":NULL
```
https://minascan.io/devnet/tx/5Jthe7JBoeULnN3tjDaoVv3sN7uW7qHruVLQM47QzsnzTvAmLZbr?type=zk-tx
Changed the channel name: Problem with UI State not being updated after smart contract TX is triggered
